sources.title: Blind Date (1959)
sources.description: Blind Date (U.S. title: Chance Meeting) is a 1959 British Film Noir murder mystery film directed by Joseph Losey and starring Hardy Kr√ºger, Stanley Baker, and Micheline Presle. Plot: Jan Van Rooyer, a young Dutch artist, working in a London private art gallery, cheerfully arrives at the large mews flat owned by Jacqueline Cousteau. The door is open and he goes in and has a drink and puts on a loud jazz record. Around 20 minutes later uniformed police arrive and start questioning him. - Refer to Wikipedia for more information
